message:
Avoid NPE when calling DriverAdapterCPDS.toString() (#31)

* Add test for DriverAdapterCPDS.toString()

It currently fails when connectionProperties are null

* Do not access connectionProperties when it's null
Simplify implementation without using the catch NPE hack.

message:
Bugzilla Bug 21748:  BasicDataSource.close() throws NPE

If a BasicDataSource is closed without having been used, the connectionPool
will not have been initialised and a NPE will be thrown.
(Reported by Aaron Knauf)
